content: अवयविन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अवयवः कारणत्वेनास्त्यस्य इनि] Having limbs, having portions or subdivisions (as a whole); अवयविना सह पूर्वादयः समस्यंते <ls>P. II. 2. 1.</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (वी) {@--1@} A whole, any substance formed of several constituents; ननु अवयविनि किं मानं Sid. Mukt. {@--2@} A syllogism, or any logical argument.
